attributes.action: Rethink drug law sentencing regarding nightclub owners and managers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition in NO WAY supports or condones the use of illegal substances.
There is an appeal pending regarding these guys please look at this article:

 http://www.mixmag.net/content/day-music-stopped

This is the most disgusting miscarriage of justice I have heard of in a long time.
Please sign this petition, so we can get these guys back to their families and lives where they should be.

rejection.details:
Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
We cannot accept petitions with links to external websites.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
